title: Softimage3D_4.0_IRIX_with_licence
description:
Softimage 3D v. 4.0 - for IRIX. Now also with Particle Suite from Phoenix Tools. Valid license for both included. Works perfectly. It's much faster then XSI (which I never managed to work). I included two versions:
- ISO image to burn on CD (if you have CD-ROM connected to your SGI)
- tar.gz archive (for others)
after transfer to SGI in console go to directory where it is located and ungzip it (gunzip Soft3D_IRIX.tar.gz) then untar the tar archive you got (i.e. tar xvf Soft3D_IRIX.tar).
That software is still very powerful and impressive. I love it.
Good luck! Have fun!
